name: Beyond its peaceful village
description: Growing up I find this place is not only my hometown but a place where I found peaceful with beloved neighborhood. Where the pomelo tree is much more older than me and where I went to the Perfume river with my granny, while she washed our clothes I have a baths with other village child. where I spent almost half of my life. I would like to tell you all about Thuy Bieu people life by the trip along the perfume river border. Along the way, hear history teller while visiting Tu Duc Tomb, Thien My pagoda, Van Mieu Quoc Tu Giam  after spending a morning at Pomelo garden and cooking Thuy Bieu regular lunch. Take a break over Vong Canh hill, Look over the traditional house "Nha Ruong". Spend the rest of the day by night boat along Perfume river.
